name: Wild Ocean Gold
description:
Into the exciting world of underwater life, your target it to collect all hidden treasures there. The ocean floor is a very good place to find gold coins, gold bars, rings and many other valuable treasures that are just waiting to be found.

If you are someone who enjoys adventure, this is a good game to treasure hunt underwater. One thing to keep in mind, you have to keep an eye on your oxygen level in your scuba diving system and to keep all marine life safe. If you are lucky enough to collect all hidden treasures, you can advance to a new location on the map of underwater treasures.
